com.elvenrings.qdemo.model

Class Question

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.elvenrings.qdemo.model.Question
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FillBlankQuestion, MultipleChoiceQuestion, SingleChoiceQuestion

    public abstract class Question
extends Object
    An abstract class representing the idea of a question. A Question consists of a series of ordered Preambles and Body parts. This class cannot be instantiated and needs to be overridden by a class that will typically implement Questionable and thus will provide a mechanism for hooking a Choice implementation on to the question.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Iliasu Salifu, iliasu@elvenrings.com
